segments.text: No thanks . We just need our check . Have you seen the waitress ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , here comes our waitress with our check .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The service here has been really great , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , the service was quite good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So , let's look at the check . The total is $ 36.00 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much do you think we should leave for a tip ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Usually people leave 15 % , but this was exceptional service . I am thinking that maybe 20 % would be appropriate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree that 20 % would be just about right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , so that will bring her tip to $ 7.20 . Add it to the $ 36.00 and the total is $ 43.20 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , what a nice dinner that was !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We'll have to make sure to come back here again real soon .
segments.speaker: S2
